name: 8videotube
description: VideoTube is a full-stack web application inspired by YouTube, built with the **MERN stack** (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js). It allows users to upload, watch, like, comment on videos, and subscribe to channels.

scripts.frontend: wait-on http://localhost:5000 && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
